title: New Radeon Graphics Card - Bugsplat Every Loading Screen (logs inside)
body:
AMD Radeon RX 470 running Crimson ReLive

Updated drivers to most recent (17.2.1)
Reinstalled clean copy of League
Created exception under firewall for Riot Games folder
Attempted every resolution possible

And now I'm not sure where to go from here. I'm hoping if I post the logs, someone might be able to infer what the issue is.

000002.322| ALWAYS| IME file, 'C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.162/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml', is optional. The following error is expected.

Thanks

replies.body: Are you able to swap out your card with another to help rule out possibilities with the hardware itself?  I'd suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide in case there other other factors causing this like game files or settings, and it's good that you've already updated your drivers.  Go over that and test it in a custom game.  Let me know the results and if you were able to swap the hardware.

Thanks for the response.

Unfortunately, this is the only video card I have on hand. I had to replace my last one (Nvidia) due to it malfunctioning. When I disabled the Radeon, I was able to connect to the custom game I created, however the game ran at about 2 fps. As soon as the card is enabled again, I simply am unable to connect to any type of game.

Do you think it is a faulty card? Should I go to the vendor and replace it?

Thanks for the info!  I don't want to give up just yet, as there could be other factors.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs about your PC specs.  Attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a look.  We will review your ticket and see if we can find options.
